text: "Cinnamon Girl" is a song first performed by Neil Young in 1969. It first appeared on the album Everybody Knows This is Nowhere. The song was released in 1970. It reached #55 on the Billboard Hot 100. The lyrics are about Young daydreaming for a girl to love, singing he waits "between shows" for her. The song was also performed by Hole in 1991. The Smashing Pumpkins recorded it in 2012. Category:Rock songs Category:1969 songs Category:Neil Young songs Category:Hole (band) songs Category:The Smashing Pumpkins songs
title: Cinnamon Girl
